data.name: Roboholic
data.detailed_description:
Roboholic is a roguelite FPS with wacky physics and even wackier abilities. An ex-farmer turned robot is resurrected over and over again in order to defeat a crazed warlord leading an army of genetically modified soldiers and malfunctioning droids.

  • Choose from an arsenal of weapons, modify your cyborg body with experimental tech and improvise your way through levels with destructible environments.
  • Exploit enemy weak points in the most effective or entertaining manner.
  • Traverse across different environments and randomly generated arenas that require rethinking your strategy.

data.short_description: Roboholic is a roguelite FPS with wacky physics and even wackier abilities. An ex-farmer turned robot is resurrected over and over again in order to defeat a crazed warlord leading an army of genetically modified soldiers and malfunctioning droids.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 3 GB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 6 GB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
  • Additional Notes:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 512 MB or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 1 GB or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
